movement.name: Fleche
movement.passiveText: If you did 0 rotation, skip the last {W} on your attack card.

movement.name: Grappling Hook
movement.activeText: {i}: Grappling Hook charges at most only as far as the first land or target in front of you. If you started Grappling Hook on land, it is a Throw.
movement.passiveText: If a {a} lands, place the target on the opposite side of your character, and knock them in that direction.

movement.name: Leap
movement.passiveText: Your attack is now a throw.

movement.name: Ninja Roll
movement.activeText: {i}: Before this movement, rotate 1 in the opposite direction of your original rotation.
movement.passiveText: For any {a} attack, it becomes {a-La-Ra} but with half damage and KBF (rounded down).

ability.name: Absorb
ability.activeText: {i}: For each point of damage that would have hit you, draw 1 card.
ability.passiveText: After this movement card is done, if you are on the abyss, you may choose to swap a movement card from your hand with one in your discard pile.

ability.name: Aerial Strike
ability.activeText: {i}: Must rotate 3 after jumping.
ability.passiveText: After completing the final move of any move ability, rotate 3.

ability.name: Bow Shot
ability.activeText: {X1}: Place one arrow in front of you facing the direction you are.
ability.passiveText: If you rotated by 1 or 2, place an arrow facing your original direction on every {m} on the original side you were facing, after the {m} is completed.

ability.name: Burning Strike
ability.activeText:
{i}: Place a fire hex on this location.

If Burning Strike is in your hand when you land an attack, you may choose to discard it and a movement card to place a hex on all hexes attacked.
ability.passiveText: For every {m}, if you actually move, place a fire hex on your starting hex.

ability.name: Chase
ability.passiveText: Add a {W} at the start of your move, turn all {m} to {2m}.

ability.name: Counter Attack
ability.activeText: {i}: Rotate after this move, not before.
ability.passiveText: Convert the first {m} to {m-Ba} with damage 3 and KBF 3.

ability.name: Cross Slash
ability.passiveText: Replace all {m} with {m-La-Ra} with damage 2, KBF 1. Discard 1.

ability.name: Down Slash
ability.activeText: {i}: Any target hit must discard 1.

ability.name: Flying Knee
ability.passiveText: All movement (not jumps) become charges with 1 damage and 1 KBF.

ability.name: Gigantic Staff
ability.passiveText: If you are over the abyss, all {m} -> {2j}.

ability.name: Guard
ability.activeText: {i}: On this frame you may choose to "continue" your block. If you do, then on Guard's {E} frame, instead return to this frame and discard 1.
ability.passiveText: All {W} frames become {Bb} instead.

ability.name: Hammer
ability.passiveText: If any attack hits you, deal the attacker 2 damage as well.

ability.name: Haven
ability.activeText: {X1}: Place an ethereal platform touching you.
ability.passiveText: If you are on the abyss, skip the first {W} on your movement.

ability.name: Healing Harmony
ability.activeText: {X1}: Reduce you and your allies' accumulated damage by 3.
ability.passiveText: If you are hit while this movement card is active, reduce the damage by 2 (min 0).

ability.name: Hip Throw
ability.activeText: {i}: Throw
ability.passiveText: While this move card is active, you cannot be thrown.

ability.name: Iron Will
ability.activeText:
{X1}: Draw 2.

If Iron Will is in your hand when you are hit, you can discard it to reduce the KBF to 0.
ability.passiveText: If you are hit while this movement card is active, reduce the KBF by 1 (min 0).

ability.name: Jab
ability.activeText: {i}: Draw 1.
ability.passiveText: Gain +30 priority.

ability.name: Parry
ability.activeText: {i}: If Parry successfully blocks a melee attack, on the following frame do 2x damage and +1 KBF back onto the attacker, and {E}.

ability.name: Push Kick
ability.passiveText: Convert all movements or jumps to backwards movements or jumps.

ability.name: Reflex Dodge
ability.activeText: {X1}: If you successfully avoided an attack, {E}.
ability.passiveText: If you would be hit during a {W}, immediately swap your movement card with Reflex Dodge.

ability.name: Rewind
ability.activeText: {F}: Note your current hex location. At any {E}, you may end Rewind's concentration to return to that location. While Rewind is concentrated, you cannot refresh, even on land.

ability.name: Sinking Shot
ability.activeText: If Sinking Shot is in your hand when an enemy is hit by a projectile, you may reveal it and discard it to force the target to discard 2 cards.

ability.name: Smash Attack
ability.passiveText: After completing a jump, {a-La-Ra-BLa-BRa-Ba} for 1 damage, and 1 KBF.

ability.name: Smoke Bomb
ability.activeText:
{i}: Rotate after this attack. All targets hit by the attack are interrupted, and stunned for 3 - your rotation. 
{X1}: Swap this card with the movement card.
ability.passiveText: All movement frames invert their direction.

ability.name: Spike
ability.activeText: {i}: Target discards 3.
ability.passiveText: While this move is active, opponent effects cannot make you discard cards.

ability.name: Stab
ability.activeText: {i}: if you are behind your opponent, +3 damage and +3 KBF.

ability.name: Sweeping Strike
ability.activeText: {i}: If the center attack hits, the target discards a card.
ability.passiveText: If an opponent stands in the way of your move, they must discard 1.

ability.name: Tackle
ability.activeText: {i}: Throw
ability.passiveText: While this move card is active, you cannot be thrown.

ability.name: Trip
ability.activeText: {i}: Target discards 2.
ability.passiveText: If you are dealt damage during this movement, convert KBF X into discard X.

ability.name: Vengeance
ability.activeText: If Vengeance is in your hand when you are knocked into the abyss, you may choose to reveal and discard it. If you do, draw as many cards as was the total hexes knocked back.

ability.name: Whirlwind
ability.activeText:
You can only use Whirlwind if you have at least 12 damage accumulated. 
{i}: KBF = 3
ability.passiveText: The final {m} becomes {c-La-Ra-BLa-BRa-Ba} with damage 1, and KBF 0.
